changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO fac_assessment_user_role (assessment_id, user_id, role_id) SELECT a.id AS assessment_id, a.created_by AS user_id, 3 AS role_id FROM fac_assessment a INNER JOIN fau_space_user_access sua ON a.space_id = sua.space_id WHERE sua.user_id = a.created_by;
